about_the_game:
Egypt, 1930, during archaeological excavations in search of Nefertiti's tomb, the archaeologist and treasure hunter Salacot Jack discovers a cursed temple filled with treasures guarded by the undead.

According to the hieroglyphics inscribed in stone, a dark pharaoh has opened the gates of the Duat to the beings of the underworld using a Scepter of Sejem.

To end the curse, one must find the pharaoh and wrest his staff of power from him, but the stone fragment indicating the location of the sarcophagus has disappeared.

Jack must search for the lost fragment, fighting his way through enemies and deadly traps while solving the mechanisms that protect each of the temple's chambers, in order to finally end the curse of the dark pharaoh.

An arcade puzzle and action game in which the player must, before time runs out, collect five trios of gems hidden in chests scattered randomly, following a randomly preset order of colors.

The player must avoid traps and use the boomerang to defeat enemies that stand in their way.
detailed_description:
Egypt, 1930, during archaeological excavations in search of Nefertiti's tomb, the archaeologist and treasure hunter Salacot Jack discovers a cursed temple filled with treasures guarded by the undead.

According to the hieroglyphics inscribed in stone, a dark pharaoh has opened the gates of the Duat to the beings of the underworld using a Scepter of Sejem.

To end the curse, one must find the pharaoh and wrest his staff of power from him, but the stone fragment indicating the location of the sarcophagus has disappeared.

Jack must search for the lost fragment, fighting his way through enemies and deadly traps while solving the mechanisms that protect each of the temple's chambers, in order to finally end the curse of the dark pharaoh.

An arcade puzzle and action game in which the player must, before time runs out, collect five trios of gems hidden in chests scattered randomly, following a randomly preset order of colors.

The player must avoid traps and use the boomerang to defeat enemies that stand in their way.
name: Salacot Jack - Deluxe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 8670M, equivalent or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 8670M, equivalent or higher

short_description: Fun puzzle and action arcade game.
